sentences.sCn: 在欧洲旅游、自由自在的学生

sentences.sContent: When the kids leave home, you’ll be footloose and fancy-free (= free and without worries ) .
sentences.sCn: 孩子离家之后，你就会自由自在、没有牵挂了。

synos.tran: 自由自在的，不受束缚的

trans.tranCn: 自由自在的, 到处走动的
trans.tranOther: free to do exactly what you want because you have no responsibilities, for example when you are not married or do not have children
